[[inst_hl_liu]]
==== HL.LIU

*Syntax:* hl.liu uimm, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load Immediate: loads a 32-bit or 48-bit immediate into register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_liu.svg[HL.LIU encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
